item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】iTunes Plus - T. Houze - The Echoes of a Sunday Soul iTunes Plus AAC M4A
item.description:
With The Echoes of a Sunday Soul, T. Houze delivers a masterfully woven blend of Neo-Soul warmth and Hip Hop’s rhythmic pulse, creating a soundtrack that mirrors the essence of late-night drives and quiet city reflections. The album pulses with nostalgia, ambition, and raw emotion, capturing moments of self-discovery, love, and the complexities of urban life.

Leading the charge are the standout singles "Jump Street" and "To The Stars", each offering a distinct yet complementary energy. "Jump Street" is a groove-heavy anthem brimming with confidence and urgency, channeling the rush of chasing dreams and taking risks. Meanwhile, "To The Stars" elevates the listener with its atmospheric production and introspective lyricism, embodying the feeling of reaching for something greater.

From soulful melodies to sharp lyricism, The Echoes of a Sunday Soul is an immersive journey through sound and storytelling, cementing T. Houze’s signature style in a space where Hip Hop meets Neo-Soul with undeniable authenticity.

The album is available on Bandcamp and on all major streaming platforms.

Tracklist:
  1. I Can Feel It Today
  2. Immaculate
  3. To The Stars (with additional vocals by Chelsie Tyrell)
  4. Sip & Reflect
  5. Odyssey (with additional vocals by Roxie Reese)
  6. Temptations (with additional vocals by Zoe Maria)
  7. Hunter
  8. Little Lies
  9. Blank Space
  10. The Hand That Feeds
  11. Jump Street (with additional vocals by Chelsie Tyrell)
  12. Heaven's Scent
